list.title: Soldier production
list.description: Reach soldiers production 2/minute, and maintain it for 30 minutes on a medium map

list.title: Soldier production small
list.description: Reach soldiers production 1/minute, and maintain it for 30 minutes on a small map

list.title: Soldier production big
list.description: Reach soldier production 4.5/minute, and maintain it for 30 minutes on a big map

list.title: One barrack
list.description: Maximize soldier production with a single barrack supplying it with materials continuously

list.title: Limited area
list.description: Reach soldier production 1/minute, and maintain it for 10 minutes with only three guardhouses

list.title: Beat the computer
list.description: Race agains a computer driven player and beat it

list.title: Small island
list.description: Start soldier production on a small island

list.title: Full mobilization
list.description: Produce as many soldiers as possible on a big island

list.title: Optimize existing empire
list.description: Create more workshops and road network to reach a soldier production level
